Class SootClassBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
      • soot.asm.SootClassBuilder
  • public class SootClassBuilder
extends org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
    Constructs a Soot class from a visited class.
    Author:
    Aaloan Miftah
